short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Local media player lets you play your favorite media (be it video, music or audio) files without any third party software.

short.ru: Локальный медиаплеер позволяет воспроизводить ваши любимые медиафайлы (будь то видео, музыка или аудио) без какого-либо стороннего…
short.zh_CN: 用于播放本地文件的视频播放器。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Local media player as the name suggests allows you to play most of the media files (.mp4,.mp3,.mkv,.webm,.avi and many more) from local PC drives, without any need to download third party softwares like VLC, Windows Media Player etc. So we help you view your local videos and also keep you safe when you download them from different sources. You do this simply from the comfort of your browser window. This is very helpful for computers with low storage space/processing power.
Some video/audio formats other than mentioned above may not work. If your file is not working with our media player than you are requested to convert your desired file into any of the above mention file formats of your choice using numerous free file converters (both offline as well as online).
We also have provided option of web based Local Media Player, which can be utilized by clicking on the text displayed on top blue ribbon in the video player window!
Please feel free to share your feedback in form of ratings and comments.

We need certain permissions like access to list of urls you visit, to keep you safe while you download videos to your local drives and also surf other websites. We don't sell this data to third parties neither is this data personally identifiable.

Terms of Service: https://mediaplayer.chromecrxstore.com/terms-of-use
Privacy Policy: https://mediaplayer.chromecrxstore.com/privacy-policy
About Us: https://mediaplayer.chromecrxstore.com/about-us

Please note that this extension contains code related to websites which includes shopping sites, accommodation booking sites and so on. 
However, this code is not used to collect any personally identifiable information.
long.de,es,fr,it,ru,zh_CN:
Local media player as the name suggests allows you to play most of the media files (.mp4,.mp3,.mkv,.webm,.3gp,.avi,.mpeg,.mpg,.ogg,.wmv,.wav,.mov) from local PC drives, without any need to download third party softwares like VLC, Windows Media Player etc. You do this simply from the comfort of your browser window. This is very helpful for computers with low storage space/processing power.
Some video/audio formats other than mentioned above may not work. If your file is not working with our media player than you are requested to convert your desired file into any of the above mention file formats of your choice using numerous free file converters (both offline as well as online).

Terms of Service: https://mediaplayer.chromecrxstore.com/terms-of-use
Privacy Policy: https://mediaplayer.chromecrxstore.com/privacy-policy
About Us: https://mediaplayer.chromecrxstore.com/about-us
